name: Dragon Daycare
description:
Baby dragons at the daycare are running amok! Get those baby dragons under control with 1 or 2 players and clean up their messes!

The game supports controllers, but only tested with Xbox One style controllers.
Controllers must be connected at the title screen or the controls screen to work!
If only one controller is connected, you can press the spacebar to change which player is assigned the controller at the controls screen.

You can press Escape to quit the game at any time.

This game is a PROTOTYPE. I made this in my free time and I'm not entirely sure in what direction I want to take it, but I hope you enjoy! I may add more levels later.
I am very open to feedback, please leave your thoughts!
